amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to create a process for Congress to review all rules currently in effect over a 5 year period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Good (VA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
